title: Welcome to My Website
subtitle: This is a simple website built with Pages CMS for easy content management

about_section.title: About Us
about_section.content:
Welcome to our website! We're passionate about creating beautiful, functional websites that are easy to manage and update.

With Pages CMS, you can edit content directly without touching any code. Simply login to the CMS interface and start editing your content in real-time.

features.title: Easy Content Management
features.description: Edit your website content through an intuitive interface without any technical knowledge required.

features.title: Responsive Design
features.description: Your website looks great on all devices - desktop, tablet, and mobile.

features.title: Fast Performance
features.description: Static site generation ensures your website loads quickly for all visitors.
